mapper.insert: insert into pg_stat_database (datid, datname, numbackends, xact_commit, xact_rollback, blks_read, blks_hit, tup_returned, tup_fetched, tup_inserted, tup_updated, tup_deleted, conflicts, temp_files, temp_bytes, deadlocks, blk_read_time, blk_write_time, stats_reset) values (#{datid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numbackends,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xactCommit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{xactRollback,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupReturned,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupFetched,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupInserted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupUpdated,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{conflicts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tempFiles,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tempBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deadlocks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blkReadTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{blkWriteTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{statsReset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select datid, datname, numbackends, xact_commit, xact_rollback, blks_read, blks_hit, tup_returned, tup_fetched, tup_inserted, tup_updated, tup_deleted, conflicts, temp_files, temp_bytes, deadlocks, blk_read_time, blk_write_time, stats_reset from pg_stat_database
